comment._content: Wikipedia on William Graves Sharp, "American lawyer, manufacturer, three-term congressman, and diplomat."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Sharp was American ambassador to France during WWI. www.ourstory.info/library/2-ww1/Sharp/memoirs04.html is his memoirs.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for providing some background information on William Graves Sharp.  We'll fill in his name in the caption the next time we update.
